price: Y les dije: ‘Pidan perdón a su Señor, porque Él es Indulgente,
arabic: فَقُلۡتُ ٱسۡتَغۡفِرُواْ رَبَّكُمۡ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ غَفَّارٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: faqul'tu is'taghfirū rabbakum innahu kāna ghaffāran
